name: Life Of Slime (itch)
description:
Overview

Life Of Slime is a 2D platformer where you play as a Slime.

Other slimes will try and stop you escaping the dungeon by making you larger and as a result an easier target for traps and enemies. The bigger you grow the harder it becomes. 

The music was created using Ecrett during the Jam. A lot of the art was made during the 48 hours but some parts were created a few weeks ago. All art was made by me using Piskel. 

Controls

A/D - Left to Right

Spacebar - Jump/Dash

Aim the dash using the cursor!
